entries.start: Psst.  Hey.... want a mount?  It's FREE!  No strings attached...
entries.choose: Which of these fine specimins would you like?
entries.toomany: You have too many pets already.
entries.goodbye: Ok goodbye!  Good luck!  Thank you for talking to me....  I'm so lonely.
entries.ok: Ok, here is your mount.  These breeds have a fairly short lifespan, don't be surprised if it only lasts a week. Take good care of it.  Come back and talk to me any time.  I sure do like talking to people.
